pages.text:
Title: A note on Demiray’s solution to the perturbed Burgers’ equation

Abstract: The travelling wave ‘solution’ to the perturbed Burgers’ equation given by Demiray [Applied Mathematical Modelling 26 (2002) 37] is incorrect; an explanation as to why this is so is given.

Abstract: The travelling wave ‘solution’ to the perturbed Burgers’ equation given by Demiray [Applied Mathematical Modelling 26 (2002) 37] is incorrect; an explanation as to why this is so is given.
